Monte Carlo diagnostics for the joint MLE.

sim_compare_info.Rd

Simulates repeated calibration/test splits under the binary misclassification model to study estimator bias, standard errors, and interval coverage.

Usage

sim_compare_info(
  B = 1000,
  N = 5000,
  theta_true = 0.3,
  q0_true = 0.8,
  q1_true = 0.85,
  m_cal = 500,
  level = 0.9
)

Arguments

B

Number of Monte Carlo repetitions.

N

Total sample size to simulate.

theta_true, q0_true, q1_true

Ground-truth prevalence/specificity/sensitivity.

m_cal

Size of the calibration set.

level

Confidence level for coverage diagnostics.

Value

List containing aggregate summaries, coverage, raw simulation draws, and ggplot2 objects for quick inspection.
